topics.body:
Okay so I'm playing Okami, and in Sei-An city there's a side quest where you have to make a big tree bloom. To do this you have to find all the other non-cursed trees and make THEM bloom. I looked for over an hour and a half for the last two trees. And I couldn't fucking find them.
[spoiler]One of them was in a guy's house, AND ONE OF THEM WAS ON THE SAME GUY'S HEAD![/spoiler]
Ffffuuuuuuck yoooouuuu game.
